predicate.note: Frames file for 'jet' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry vehicle-51.4.1.

roleset.name: move quickly, as in a jetplane

example.name: life in the jet set
example.text: When it's time for their biannual powwow, the nation's manufacturing titans typically jet off to the sunny confines of resort towns like Boca Raton and Hot Springs.
example.arg: When it's time for their biannual powwow
the sunny confines of resort towns like Boca Raton and Hot Springs
